iPeel - September 27, 2011 - Galaxy Tab 10.1 with version 1.14
Too many 0's in additions
Please provide the ability to remove zeros in games, they come up too many times and are little use in teaching addition to small children. Also please put a border between the addition multiple choice numbers and the bottom of the screen, small fingers often hit the back or home buttons by mistake.

div.h4: The graphics are Great the platform is Perfect!

div.p: My 5 yr old is great with words. Reading and writing came naturally to her. Math was a whole different ballgame. This app by Intellijoy, "Kids Numbers and Math", has brightened her world of learning to mathematics. I appreciate the effort from all the programmers and graphics/software engineers involved with creating this app. Its so captivating and encouraging, purely a joy for both of us!!! :) Thank You
Perfect for kids waiting for new updates
